Entries.keahi_nosorry: Hmph! That Keahi! He didn't even bother to say sorry.$a

Entries.RSV_GH1: I can't wait to plant some crops inside the Greenhouse!$h#$b#I think it also echos a bit in there, It would be nice for singing.$u
Oh boy! A Greenhouse! This is exciting!$h#$b#We can plant expensive crops where they won't ever decay!$h#$b#More money!$h
I'll be growing lot's of flowers inside the Greenhouse!$h#$b#Finally, my own little dream can be made come true!$h
Teehee, I can make my own little fairytale garden inside the Greenhouse.$h#$b#Huh? What? No, You heard nothing!$a

The ones who have personal plots in the first Greenhouse besides you are Jeric, Alissa, Olga, and Maddie.#$b#I'm quite curious about Maddie's intention with the Greenhouse though.#$b#Either way, I'm glad it's being used as much as possible.$h

Entries.aguar1_1: Hmmmm..$a#$b#Yes that was magic @.$a#$b#And no one was suppose to see that.

Entries.alissa1_1: You're a curious one huh?#$b#Well I believe you're a good person so I don't really worry much.$h#$b#I should remember to lock the shed more often though!$s
Entries.alissa1_2: Uhm what!?$7#$b#Hey! Stop it with the jokes now!$a#$b#Don't go saying silly things!$h
Entries.alissa1_3: Aha! I should've known!$a#$b#You fool! You won't find anything here though!$a#$b#For I haven't sort things yet!$h#$b#Haha nice one there @.$h

Entries.bert1_1: Dandy! Thanks a lot @! You're the best!$h
Entries.bert2_1: Hmm. Yes, I do think that would be better.
Entries.bert2_2: Why yes! She has been bugging me about going out of town for a while now!.

Entries.lola1_1: Ohh! Oh my I'm excited that you have!$h
Entries.lola1_2: Oh? Hmm. I'm sorry for asking such a weird question.%fork$s

Entries.pika1_1: Huh? Did I hear that right?$h
Entries.pika1_2: Oh? Okay, I know you're busy too @.%fork

Entries.trinnie1_1: Really @? Coming from a farmer, that means a lot!$h
Entries.trinnie1_2: Hmph! If you think I'm weird then you have no passion for taking care of plants! Shame on you farmer!%fork$a

Entries.flor1_1: Huh?... Really?..$s#$b#You're so kind and understanding @.. Thank you..$s
Entries.flor1_2: I.. I.. I know!.. It was so careless of me..$s
Entries.flor1_3: WAH! Don't say that!!!$s#$b#You pervert!!$s%fork^Huh?? What??..$s#$b#Come on now! You're embarrassing me!...$s

Entries.maddie1_3: Huh?$a#$b#You don't think I--$s#$b#Ahem! I mean, why do I care?$a#$b#Does smiling contribute to progress of my work?$a
Entries.maddie2_2: Oh? Really now?#$b#Well why are you here then?
Entries.maddie3_1: Wha--What?$8#$b#Wha--what are you saying?$a#$b#Ha-ha-ha. Very funny now.$7
Entries.maddie4_1: @... I think you should go ho--$10
Entries.maddie4_2: I think I need space from you for a while @...$10

Entries.ysabelle1_1: Yeah...$9#$b#But it doesn't stop it from hurting when you remember it though..$9#$b#But you're right @..$8#$b#I do have to move on huh..$11
Entries.ysabelle1_2: Hmph, how rude of you @.$10#$b#You seem to only care for your own entertainment huh?$10#$b#How immature.$10%fork
Entries.ysabelle1_3: Heh, you really found the time to attempt an advance huh?$9#$b#I appreciate the thought @, but really, you suck at timing.$9#$b#Teehee, But I have to admit, it did cheer me up a bit.$8#$b#Thank you for that.$11

Entries.ian1_1: Huh? You want to help me?#$b#No really, I'm fine @.$h#$b#And I really don't want to bother you.
Entries.ian1_2: Okay then, see ya around I guess.
Entries.ian2_1: That's what I'm hoping too @..$s#$b#I just can't help being so anxious about it you know?$s#$b#I just want to know..$s
Entries.ian2_2: I think I won't be able to sleep well when I don't know what's their condition at the moment..$s#$b#But @, I really appreciate the concern..$s#$b#Thank you..$h
Entries.ian2_3: You'd really stick around with me when I'm this mopey? Thanks @, You're a good friend..$h#$b#I just can't help being this scared though..$s

Entries.philip1_1: You like it?!$h#$b#I'm glad you did! It is a little childish so I was worried if you'd find it weird.$6#$b#I'm glad I didn't really waste your time.$h
Entries.philip1_2: Yeah it is a little childish I admit.$6#$b#It's primary audience focus are on children really, it's not really a serious and dark type of comic book.$6#$b#But I do hope you still enjoyed it a little.$h
Entries.philip1_3: Oh really? You hate it that much?$s#$b#Uhmm.. I'm sorry for wasting your time..$s%fork

Entries.AlissaLetter: Hello @!,^^I just wanted to tell you that I may have finished the song we talked about last time! You know, the one where I ran away from you? Anyway. I wanted to let you know and I look forward to having you hear it! Visit me at my house whenever you're free.^^- Alissa
Entries.AlissaPerform: Hello @!,^^There will be a little get together at the village later. Lenny hopes to have everyone attend. She made invitations for everyone. I personally asked her if it's fine if I make the invitation letter to you. Uhm no reason! Anyway, I hope to see you there!^^- Alissa
Entries.FlorLetter: Dear @,^I have gathered and prepared all the necessary materials and forms for the research on interactions between peers with contasting or atleast different interests. I shall await for you in my room at the hotel.^^Sincerely, Florabelle V. Hibisca
Entries.MaddieDate: @,^^Meet me at my house. 4PM to 5PM Don't be late.^^- Maddie
Entries.JericLetter: Hey gorgeous,^^Meet me at my farm by 5PM to 6PM later.^^- J.J.
Entries.GH1Letter: Dear @,^^We would like to invite you in the celebration for the restoration of one of the Greenhouses at the Ridgeside Village! It's restoration and the said event would not have taken place if not for your help, So we would really love it when you attend.^Hope to see you there!^^- Lenny^Ridgeside Village Manager

I supposed it can't be helped.#$b#Perhaps I could trust you."/faceDirection Aguar 3/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Aguar "I trust you won't tell my secret to anyone @.#$b#What you have seen is something not favorable in the lines of magic and science.#$b#As for those two are polar opposites."/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move Aguar 1 0 1/pause 500/speak Aguar "I am currently working on a small project myself.#$b#It involves the river passing here."/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Aguar 3/pause 200/speak Aguar "That's all you need to know for now @."/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Aguar "For now, I just trust you won't reveal this to anyone.#$b#This is for the greater good.#$b#You'll understand someday."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/fade/end dialogueWarpOut Aguar "I trust you keep your mouth shut."

Entries.75160062/f Aguar 1000/t 1200 1800/e 7516: WizardSong/10 8/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Aguar 4 8 0 Wizard 8 8 3/skippable/pause 1000/move Aguar -1 0 0/pause 1000/move Aguar 1 0 0/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Really Aguar, I'll be fine with just a cup of water.#$b#It's been so long since we talked old friend."/speak Aguar "And for an old friend you deserve the best Rasmodius.#$b#Here, I have reserved some beverages my assistant has bought me the other day.#$b#They are quite good.$h"/speak Wizard "Ah! I heard about this place, Pika's isn't it?#$b#An outdoor eatery?"/move Aguar 0 1 1/move Aguar 2 0 1/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/speak Aguar "Ah. Here Rasmodius."/speak Wizard "Thank you Aguar."/speak Aguar "Now, where were we..."/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 13/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Aguar 2/emote Aguar 8/emote Wizard 8/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Aguar "You again?$a#$b#What are you doing here?"/speak Wizard "Ah. @. I didn't know you knew Mr. Aguar."/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Aguar 1/speak Wizard "Does the young one know about your secret Aguar?"/speak Aguar "Unfortunately yes.#$b#This little one here snoops around better than a rat."/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Wizard "Then it's all fine then.#$b#@ is very reliable with things concerning magic.#$b#Come @. Sit."/speak Aguar "Hey hey now Rasmodius, this is still my domain.#$b#Don't get too carried away now."/emote Wizard 28/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 2 0 0/speak Aguar "Here @. Let me get you something to drink."/move Aguar -1 0 0/move Aguar 0 -1 0/speak Wizard "Aguar, I believe it's best I resume discussing about the anomaly in this river.#$b#Things might not turn out good for this mountain village if certain elements are not managed."/emote farmer 8/move Aguar 0 1 1/move Aguar 1 0 1/emote Aguar 12/pause 500/speak Aguar "You think I don't know that @.#$b#Ever sine I retired and shifted my focus to science, I've been trying to find a scientific explanation to the anomaly.#$b#The river won't overflow, but it won't dry up as well.#$b#It's quite curious.#$b#I thought learning science would find more clues regarding this problem."/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "Our apologies @. Let us fill you in with the details."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Wizard "As you may know, Aguar here is an ex-wizard and an old colleague of mine.#$b#He quit magic and continued his studies in science, specifically the fields of hydrology, ecology, and geology.#$b#The reason? Well it would be better if he tells you."/emote Aguar 12/pause 500/speak Aguar "Hmmmm.. Well. I have lived my childhood days here in this village.#$b#Before I entered the school of magic. I lived a normal life here at the ridge.#$b#As I learned magic and grew. I found out that there seems to be a problem here at the passing river here in this village."/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Aguar "I couldn't find the problem with magic alone. So I pursused science.#$b#But learning both was too hard of a task and does not usually mix well.#$b#You see, magic does not bid well with the laws of science.#$b#But in hopes to find the cause of this river's anomaly, I go to great lengths and try to integrate two fields.#$b#In hopes of finding the root of the problem."/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Hmmm.. Perhaps if you let @ help you Aguar.#$b#@ here has a special connection with the nature and it's magic.#$b#Maybe their company would be of use?"/speak Aguar "Hmmm. You may have a point Rasmodius.#$b#Perhaps you can be useful after all @!$h"/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Wizard "I would be monitoring the town Aguar.#$b#If you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to ask me.#$b#For old time's sake."/speak Aguar "It's all fine Rasmodius.#$b#This is my responsibility."/faceDirection Aguar 2/emote Aguar 40/pause 500/speak Aguar "@. I trust you don't tell anyone about what we talked about here.#$b#We don't want to cause any panic.#$b#I am grateful to have you assist me. But please do be obedient and don't waste my time."/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Aguar "Alright! Good!$h#$b#For now, I would want to discuss more about the anomaly with Rasmodius.#$b#You are free to stay if you so desire."/faceDirection Aguar 1/emote farmer 56/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "Hmmmm.. Isn't it that..."/pause 800/textAboveHead Aguar "Yes and it was when..."/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "Mr. Aguar and Mr. Rasmodius talked more about their old times and the river problem.#I do hope that this river problem is nothing too serious."/end dialogueWarpOut Aguar "It was a nice chat @.$h"

The ground collapsed and you fell!"/pause 500/playSound ow/pause 1000/speak Aguar "@, Are you still alive?#$b#Don't worry I'm going down."/pause 1000/stopMusic/playMusic Cavern/changeToTemporaryMap AguarCave false/warp farmer 12 26/warp Aguar 14 26/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Aguar 3/showFrame farmer 5/fade/viewport 10 20/pause 1000/speak Aguar "You seem alright @.#$b#Come on, stand up now.#$b#Look what we have discovered!$h"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/move farmer -3 0 0 true/move Aguar -3 0 0 true/pause 3000/emote Aguar 56/pause 500/speak Aguar "Hm, so this underground flora might have been the reason for the river's instability.#$b#There seems to be ancient magic overflowing in the soil and it's causing rapid growth of flora all year long."/move Aguar -1 0 0/move Aguar 0 -2 0/pause 500/emote Aguar 40/pause 500/speak Aguar "Just as I thought...$a#$b#The unstable ancient magic here has also been causing the erosion of soil.#$b#If it's not stabilized, the  ridge might collapse!$a"/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection Aguar 2/pause 500/speak Aguar "We still have time @.#$b#We must do further research on this so we can find a safe solution.#$b#Being reckless would might just make things worse.$a"/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Aguar "I'll go back to the lab and try to find out more.#$b#I shall also ask Rasmodius for some knowledge about ancient magic as well."/move Aguar 0 2 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Aguar "@. I suggest you go home and rest for a while.#$b#That was a long fall that you sustained.#$b#I shall notify you if I find anything useful."/emote farmer 56/pause 500/move Aguar 3 0 2 true/move farmer 2 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "Hmmm.. I do hope Mr. Aguar finds a solution soon."/pause 1000/end dialogueWarpOut Aguar "Great job today @. Now if you excuse me, I need to research more on this..."

I just worry about my family..$s#$b#They still haven't written back..$s#$b#I worked so hard for that letter, along with all the work I do just to send money to them..$s#$b#And I worry they haven't received any of it, because they haven't wrote back yet..$s#$b#I'm so worried.. I'm so anxious..$s"/faceDirection farmer 3/message "Ian is trembling..#He seems to be really scared.."/playMusic cm:IanTheme/pause 5000/speak Ian "I work so hard for them you know..$6#$b#Especially for my younger sister..$6#$b#She needs the money to finish her college, and she deserves that kind of life..$6#$b#And when she does, She won't have to work so many extra jobs just to earn decent money..$6#$b#I didn't finish my school, and here I am, all dumb and all.$6#$b#All I could depend on is my body, so I worked and worked and worked.$6#$b#I moved here to the valley because it's the farthest I can afford.$6#$b#And since then, I've been working all the available jobs, no matter the pay.. Just to get enough coin to send back..$6#$b#I missed them the other day and I wanted to check upon how they were doing..$6#$b#But I haven't received any letter back yet.. And I'm starting to worry if the money I send is even reaching them you know?$6#$b#I.. I just want a good life for my family, especially my little sister..$6#$b#She deserves a happy life.$6#$b#We've been living under a poor life, poverty as you call it, for all our lives..$6#$b#She dreams to be a doctor one day you know..$7#$b#I'd do anything for my family.. For my little sister..$7#$b#I don't even care if I get mocked for not being able to read, or when I work 20 hours a day.$7#$b#I'd gladly do all of it, just for them.$7"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Ian 2/pause 2000/move Ian -1 0 3/message "Ian seems to be wiping his tears off"/speak Ian "(sniff) And yeah..$s#$b#That's why I've been working so much..$s#$b#And why I'm so scared right now..$s#$b#I just want to know if they're doing good..$s#$b#I'm scared if anything happened to them and I'm not there..$s#$b#I just hope they reply soon..$s#$b#Any kind of reply will do..$s"/emote farmer 40/speak Ian "$q 75160148 null#Ian is scared.#$r 75160147 0 ian2_1#I'm sure a reply will come up soon. Just you wait.#$r 75160148 0 ian2_2#You should take a break when you can, You're really tired right now.#$r 75160148 0 ian2_3#I'll be here whenever you need someone to vent out your frustrations to."/pause 1000/emote Ian 40/faceDirection Ian 1/speak Ian "I should wait right?$s#$b#I.. I don't know...$s"/move farmer -1 0 3/message "You put your hand in Ian's shoulder"/emote farmer 32/emote Ian 28/speak Ian "I guess there's no point to worry so much right now..$s#$b#I should really learn to wait huh?$s#$b#I'm sorry for being this mopey @. I saw other youngsters grow up.#$b#I saw everything grow up and move along with time.#$b#And you my friend, and your kindess towards me has affected my view of the world.#$b#So thank you my good friend."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection Richard 3/pause 500/speak Richard "Because of everyone around me... I have not felt alone anymore..#$b#And I think... It's time to let go I say...$s#$b#It's time to grow up as well. Even for me...#$b#And I know.. That's all she ever wants for me.. To be happy..$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection Richard 2/pause 500/speak Richard "Hmm.. I do think I'll catch up with you inside @.#$b#Thank you for the talk @. Entries.75160077/f Freddie 2000/e 75160076/t 130: summer_day_ambient/10 57/farmer 10 63 0 Freddie 9 59 0/skippable/pause 200/move Freddie 0 -2 1/emote Freddie 40/pause 500/speak Freddie "Hmm.. I think I should start cleaning this up huh?..$4"/move farmer 0 -4 0/faceDirection Freddie 2/emote Freddie 56/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Freddie "Ah @, It's a delight to see you lad.^Ah @, It's a delight to see you lass.#$b#I was just about to start cleaning up this old toy."/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Freddie "Hmmm? Why do we have this?#$b#Hmm...$s"/faceDirection Freddie 1/pause 1000/speak Freddie "Where should I start..#$b#I guess I should open up to you about this.#$b#You're my good friend. And I know Lola doesn't want to talk about this."/emote farmer 40/pause 500/question null "Freddie just locks his eyes at the toy.#Are you okay?#*keep quiet*"/pause 1000/speak Freddie "Lola and I once had a son.$s#$b#Rex.. Yes.. Little Rex was his name.. He was about 5 years old.$s#$b#Before we moved here into the ridge, we never stayed in one place. Always moving as we get new missions everyday and it's dangeruous to stay in one place for too long.$s#$b#Rex had no complains, he would just smile and hug us tight whenever we came home.$s#$b#The little boy was just happy whenever we came home alive..$s#$b#He never asked for anything more. He was a sweet little kid..$s#$b#I tell you, I bet he got the sweet side from me! Haha..$4#$b#And well.. There was one day when we went out shopping as a family, he found this toy. This exact toy and this was the only thing he ever asked for us.#$b#He was really excited and all! I can remember the glowing look on his face when Lola led the way to the toy store.#$b#It was also at that time where Lola and I were suddenly called to a mission to a nearby building.$s#$b#If I remember.. It was a terrorist attack to a certain political assembly..$s#$b#My wife and I then had to rush in for they may be a huge casualty if they were not stopped..$s#$b#We told Rex to wait for us in the toy store and we hurried off.$s#$b#Our sweet little boy didn't even flinch or frown... He simply held us close and told us 'I'll wait for you here Mama and Papa. Buy me the toy when you come back okay?'$s#$b#We went off and dealt with the threat. All seemed to go on fine.. Until.."/globalFade/stopMusic/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playSound clubswipe/message "Rebel: Get back you two! Try to come closer and the city streets go 'KABOOM'#Lola: We can't let him get away Fred, He's got the files!#Freddie: I know hon... But he got us cornered.. They planted bombs all over the city. Rex maybe in danger.#Lola: Uhhgg.. We shouldn't have left Rex at the store...#Freddie: I got a plan, It's now or never..#Lola: Okay.. Got it.#Rebel: Hmm?? What are you two doing? Huh? HUH!!?#Freddie: Lola! Now!#*Lola jumps in and tackles the rebel as she teleports from the shadows.*#Freddie:Gotcha!#Rebel: Ahah! I'll give my life for the empire!#Lola: FRED! HE'S GOT A SECOND TRIGGER!#Fred: Ugh!"/playSound clubswipe/message "Freddie: He pressed it? But why isn't anything happening?#Lola: Wait.. No, this one has a timer! Tell the citizens to evacuate!#Freddie: GOT IT!#Lola: Rex.. Oh my son.. I hope you run away..#Freddie: Lola! They have started the announcement. We have to go and get Rex NOW!"/pause 2000/message "Lola: Please we should make it in time! My sweet little boy!#Freddie: Please.. please run Rex.."/pause 1000/playSound explosion/pause 500/playSound explosion/pause 500/playSound explosion/pause 2000/fade/viewport 10 57/playMusic desolate/pause 1000/speak Freddie "All the citizens were able to evacuate in time thanks to the announcements..$s#$b#But.. among the collapsed buildings.. We saw what was left of the toy store..$s#$b#And... under all that.. Well.. He was.. He was waiting for us...$s#$b#He didn't go.. He was too young to recognize the danger and persisted to stay.. Maybe he didn't know what to do..$s#$b#He just stayed.. and waited for us.. And at that moment..$s#$b#We just saw him.. But he was no longer here..$s"/pause 500/move Freddie 0 -1 1/move Freddie 1 0 2/speak Freddie "After all has been settled, My wife and I retired.$s#$b#We saw the same toy from the toy store and bought it.. We don't knw why, but we just did.$s#$b#We eventually found this village and thought this may be the best place to settle down.$s#$b#And since then.. It has been a quiet life."/emote farmer 40/pause 500/question null "...#I'm sorry..#*keep quiet*"/pause 500/faceDirection Freddie 1/speak Freddie "That was such a long time ago young @.#$b#And.. I can't say that I have moved on from all that..$s#$b#But all I know now is that our little boy is in a better place now. Away from all the cruelties of this world."/faceDirection Freddie 2/speak Freddie "You know @. If Rex would still be here,#$b#I bet he would be at your age.$h#$b#And I bet you two would've been good friends."/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Freddie "I'm sorry for all that heavy talk..$s#$b#But I'm very thankful I got to open up about that.#$b#It's been hard for my wife and I.. And I'm happy for a good friend to talk about it with.#$b#Thank you @."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Freddie "Well then. I guess I better start cleaning this now.#$b#It has gotten all rusty!$h#$b#Oh! And if you ever have kids with your special someone in the future, They can always visit here anytime okay?$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end position 14 64

Please hold your applause until after the tour!$4#$b# I'm the chief administrative officer of Ridgeside.$h#$b# It's a complicated way to say: 'She who does the paperwork'!$h#$b#We don't get a lot of visitors from outside the valley, so we're really happy to see you!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Lenny 16/pause 500/speak Lenny "You must be the budding entrepreneur that moved into the big ol' farm over yonder. $h#$b#It was owned by a good friend of mine, so I hope you'll take good care of it.#$b#A good friend, indeed...$s"/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Lenny "Let me show you around town with a quick tour.$h#$b#Buckle up, buckaroo!"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Lenny -5 0 3 true/move farmer -5 0 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Lenny 116 26/faceDirection Lenny 3/warp farmer 117 26/faceDirection farmer 3/fade/viewport 114 26/move Lenny -2 0 0 true/move farmer -2 0 0 true/emote Lenny 32/pause 500/speak Lenny "First, we have the Log Cabin Hotel. It's a great place to relax after a long hike through the mountains.$h#$b#It even has a gym on the third floor if you're still not worn out after your hike!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Lenny 0 3 2 true/pause 500/move farmer 0 3 2 true/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Lenny 116 45/faceDirection Lenny 3/warp farmer 118 45/faceDirection farmer 3/fade/viewport 114 45/move Lenny -3 0 2 true/move farmer -3 0 2 true/pause 1000/speak Lenny "This, right here is the town square. It's the beating heart of the village.$h#$b#Folks like to hang around here and socialize with other townspeople, weather permitting."/faceDirection Lenny 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lenny "Up these stairs is where the magic happens. That's my office.#$b#It's made of wood, bricks and paperwork!$h#$b#I occasionally visit Lewis regarding municipal duties or, you know, just to tease him for taking himself too seriously.#$b#It's my Yoba-given right as his sister!$h"/emote farmer 56/pause 500/move Lenny -3 0 3 true/move farmer -3 0 3 true/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Lenny 88 62/faceDirection Lenny 3/warp farmer 89 61/faceDirection farmer 3/fade/viewport 88 61/pause 500/emote Lenny 32/pause 500/speak Lenny "Smell that? That's Pika's Outdoor Restaurant!$h#$b# I like the dishes he serves and I love the atmosphere!#$b#Don't even get me started on the view! Don't look down, though. If you do, don't blame me when you start feeling nauseous!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 89 52/warp Lenny 87 52/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Lenny 0/fade/viewport 87 48/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/move Lenny 0 -5 0 true/pause 1000/emote Lenny 28/pause 500/speak Lenny "Feast your eyes on the Starbound Stage. Robin and Clint helped us build this stage for gatherings and activities.$4#$b#It hasn't seen much use lately. It's a shame, to tell the truth.#$b#Local morale hasn't been all that great recently, too. There are rumours going around town about dangerous fruits and spooky ghosts.$s#$b#I can assure you, those are nothing but rumors!$h#$b#The only dangerous fruit is a pumpkin during Spirit's Eve!$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Lenny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Lenny "There are several other farmers living in the village.#$b#Jeric's farm, the Blooming Hill Farm, is located on the west side of the village. He sells useful farm materials.$h#$b#We also have Nightingale Orchard on the south side of the village, managed by the Lidens and their niece, Alissa.#$b#Alissa is a sweet young lady with a wonderful voice!$h#$b#She lacks the confidence to perform, unfortunately.$s#$b#Perhaps someone special could help her find herself.$h"/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Lenny "That concludes the grand tour. So I can make a better picnic!$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Jeric 1/emote Jeric 60/speak Jeric "Hey, stop staring at me with those pretty eyes of yours now..$l#$b#I might melt here.$l"/emote farmer 32/emote Jeric 56/speak Jeric "But hey, really though @.$l#$b#I'm glad you're with me.$l"/emote farmer 32/message "Jeric gently caresses your cheek.."/speak Jeric "@..$l"/showFrame Jeric 42/positionOffset Jeric 10 0/positionOffset farmer -10 0/animate farmer true true 100 101/emote farmer 20/pause 2000/viewport -1000 -1000/message "It was nice relaxing time with Jeric.#I hope we have more of those again soon. <"/speak Jeric "Hey babe, After we clean up, Let's 'clean up' back at my house as well..$l#$b#I mean, If you want too.$6"/pause 1000/end dialogue Jeric "Hey come on now!$l#$b#Can you stop being that cute?$6#$b#You want another clean up session or something?$l#$b#I'm just kidding!$6"
Entries.75160157/f Kenneth 500/w rainy/t 1200 14: playful/128 25/farmer 135 26 3 Kenneth 127 25 3/skippable/showFrame Kenneth 19/pause 500/emote Kenneth 56/move farmer -6 0 3/emote farmer 8/speak Kenneth "And the lamp head is well secure.$h#$b#That's nice."/emote Kenneth 8/showFrame Kenneth 17/speak Kenneth "Oh, @ right?#$b#Well hello there. What are you doing out in the rain?#$b#And the hike to the village is a timely one as well, you good?"/emote farmer 56/speak Kenneth "Well it looks like you're alright.$h#$b#I'm sorry but I'd have to finish inspecting this lamp here.#$b#It's infamous for breaking during rains.#$b#We don't want anyone getting hurt now.$h"/emote farmer 32/showFrame Kenneth 19/move farmer -3 0 3/playSound crafting/emote Kenneth 16/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Kenneth "Ouch!$a#$b#I think this bolt was an old bolt!$a#$b#It broke as I was tightening it.$s#$b#I can't seem to let go of the lamp head or else it falls and breaks.$s#$b#I'm sorry @, but is it okay if you can give me a hand for a while?$s"/emote farmer 32/emote Kenneth 28/speak Kenneth "Thank you so much!$h#$b#Okay, pass me that wrench there from my toolbox."/emote farmer 56/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 2000/move farmer -1 0 0/playSound pickUpItem/speak Kenneth "Okay, this should put this back up...#$b#There!$h"/emote farmer 56/emote Kenneth 28/speak Kenneth "Hup!$h"/move Kenneth 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Kenneth "Thanks a lot for helping me @$h#$b#I think you better seek shelter and dry yourself soon now, I'm sorry for making you stay under the rain a little more.$s#$b#But really, thanks!$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Kenneth "Then now! I'm off to the other lamps!$h#$b#This was the first lamp of the day you see?$h"/emote farmer 16/speak Kenneth "Bye now!$h"/speed Kenneth 3/move Kenneth 0 6 2 true/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/end dialogue Kenneth "Fixing lamps is kind of relaxing really.$h#$b#I should be careful next time though. By the way, thanks again for earlier.$h"
Entries.75160166/e 75160165/f Philip 2000/w sunn: cm:PhilipTheme/113 23/farmer 114 27 0 Philip 112 23 2/skippable/showFrame Philip 23/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 0 -4 3/move farmer -1 0 3/message "Philip fell asleep outside.#It seemed he fell asleep while reading a comic book"/speak Philip "*snore*...$10#$b#Huh?$10"/emote Philip 8/faceDirection Philip 2/jump Philip/emote Philip 16/speak Philip "Woah! I fell asleep!$u"/faceDirection Philip 1/speak Philip "Oh! Hey there @.$6#$b#It's kinda embarrassing you found me asleep here in the hotel lawn.$6#$b#I was just reading a comic book after a whole day of work.$6#$b#I guess I was really tired that I just immediately fell asleep.$h#$b#Quite embarrassing huh?$6"/emote farmer 32/speak Philip "Haha you're real kind @.$6#$b#I really should sleep in my room now huh?#$b#But it's so relaxing here though.$6"/emote farmer 8/speak Philip "How's work? It was good.$6#$b#I'm just super happy of my patient's progress so far.#$b#It warms my heart to see their eyes light up with hope whenever therapy shows good progress in their recovery.$h"/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Philip 2/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Philip "Hey @, Is it fine if I sit while I talk?$6#$b#I'm a little tired haha.$h"/emote farmer 32/showFrame Philip 23/speak Philip "I really like my job. Ever since I was a kid, I wanted to be like IncrediMan.#$b#But ofcourse I have no super powers and all. So I aimed to become a healthcare professional.$6#$b#I then found Physical Therapy, and pursued it.#$b#And ever since, I was happy I found a job where I can be like my hero, who gave hope to people who are in need.#$b#It's kind of cheesy but I genuinely am thankful for this life.$h#$b#It's a simple life but I'm happy.#$b#No matter how tired I get, It fuels me to see my patients recover.$h#$b#Movement and function is often taken for granted when you don't have problems with it you know.#$b#But once you realize you have lost them, It brings such despair.$s#$b#And so, I wish to bring back hope in the eyes of those who lost it, for that what IncrediMan would do when he saves the world.$h#$b#I'm happy..$h#$b#Im--*yawn*...$10"/emote farmer 8/positionOffset Philip 10 0/message "Philip has fallen asleep again.#His head now on your shoulder.#But with a content smile in his face as he was trying to finish his sentence"/emote farmer 32/speak Philip "*snooze*$10"/message "He's sound asleep.#(Yawn) you seem to be getting sleepy aswell.."/showFrame 4/pause 1000/message "(yawn)"/showFrame 5/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/speak Lenny "Hey you two.#$b#Are you both doing okay?$h#$b#You both do know you can just check-in the hotel and sleep in a bed instead in the lawn right?$h"/addTemporaryActor Lenny 16 32 114 23 3/fade/viewport 113 23/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/emote Philip 16/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Philip 1/speak Philip "Woah! How long have we've been asleep there?$6"/emote farmer 28/speak Lenny "I'm not really sure, I was just on my way to the hotel.$h#$b#You two seem so tired from all your hard work though. And you both deserve some rest.#$b#But I recommened not sleeping here unguarded, some guests here are unpredictable you know?$h"/emote farmer 28 true/emote Philip 28/speak Philip "We're so sorry Lenny. And thanks for waking us up.$6"/speak Lenny "It's alright dears.$h#$b#Well, I better get going now. See you both around.$h"/move Lenny 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Lenny -100 -100/emote Philip 60/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 60/speak Philip "Hehe, I'm sorry I fell asleep again @..$6#$b#Not to mention, I fell asleep leaning on you..$l#$b#But I didn't expect you to fall asleep too.$l#$b#I can't blame you though, you work so hard as well. You're amazing you know that.$h"/emote farmer 60/speak Philip "But hey.. Thanks for not leaving me alone here.$l#$b#And thanks for the good nap.. Hehe.$l"/emote farmer 32/emote farmer 60/speak Philip "Okay.. Uhmm. I think we both need some rest for ourselves huh?$6#$b#I'm going inside to my room now.$h#$b#Please take care of yourself too @.$6#$b#Have a good rest now.$l"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Philip "I have to admit, It was really peaceful and comforting to sleep beside you @..$l#$b#Oh! Sorry! That came out weird!$u#$b#*facepalming*$6#$b#Uhmm see you around @.$l"

I'm a part time adventurer who handles monsters every Thursday!$h#$b#And you're the hardworking, amazing love of mine..$l#$b#Uhmm. I don't know why.. But I always felt at ease with you..$l#$b#You're one of the greatest reasons why I'd keep on fighting the evils of the world.$l#$b#I don't have much to say @.. Entries.75160143/e 75160142/f Ysabelle 1500/w su: summer_day_ambient/18 22/farmer 25 19 3 Ysabelle 17 22 3/skippable/showFrame Ysabelle 27/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer -4 0 3/emote Ysabelle 40/pause 1000/speak Ysabelle "Why did you have to call...$s#$b#I really really miss you both.. But..$s#$b#You don't seem to understand..$7"/emote farmer 8/emote Ysabelle 16/faceDirection Ysabelle 1/speak Ysabelle "@! Woah! Hey!$u#$b#Uhmm... Did you just hear me talking to myself??$6#$b#Oh my.. That must've been a weird site to behold huh?$6"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Ysabelle "Before we continue, I'm not comfortable speaking with you while you're being that far away.#$b#Come sit beside me would you!$h#$b#Silly you."/emote farmer 28/move farmer -2 0 2/faceDirection Ysabelle 2/move farmer 0 3 2/emote Ysabelle 28/faceDirection Ysabelle 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Ysabelle "Hey uhm, so again, pardon for that really weird display.$6#$b#I was just talking to myself about stuff related to my parents.$s#$b#They called and talked to me earlier via the phone and discussed some matters regarding my dance career.$s#$b#And hmph... They still don't get it...$s"/emote farmer 8/emote Ysabelle 16/faceDirection Ysabelle 2/emote Ysabelle 40/speak Ysabelle "Oh that's right, I have not opened up to you about that huh?$6#$b#Hmm..$s"/emote Ysabelle 40/faceDirection Ysabelle 1/speak Ysabelle "Come, sit closer would you?$6"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/move farmer 0 -1 3/showFrame Ysabelle 27/move farmer -2 0 3/emote Ysabelle 40/speak Ysabelle "Hmm.. Remember that time where I was really frustrated with my dancing?$s#$b#Well, it wasn't like that before..$s#$b#I used to dance with no care in the world, just express myself and all.$6#$b#The feeling was lovely, It was freeing, it was 'me'.$0#$b#And I would give anything up just to regain that feeling back...$s"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Ysabelle "You see... My parents were really obsessed with the idea of being famous and all.$s#$b#So when they saw how good I was with ballet, they pressured me to achieve higher awards, win competitions, be more..$s#$b#At first it was nothing, as a young child it felt like I was given what I wanted. And I just kept at it..$s#$b#But as I grew up, the demands rose along with my age..$s#$b#To just keep on dancing.. dancing.. dancing and DANCING.. But it wasn't out of passion anymore..$s#$b#I was tired.. I was lost.. It all felt wrong..$s#$b#I wasn't able to make any friends anymore, for mom would say they would be a hindrance to my training...$s#$b#I wasn't able to eat my favorite foods too.. For dad said it would affect my performance..$s#$b#I.. I...$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/playMusic cm:YsabelleTheme/speak Ysabelle "I hated myself... I hated to dance..$7#$b#It all felt so wrong.$7#$b#I felt so frustrated, conflicted, sad, angry, I... I don't know..$7#$b#I couldn't even cry my self to sleep in some nights because of how tired I would've been..$7#$b#I kept this facade of smiles, grace, and perfection as my image grew, and as my parents enjoyed the fame..$7#$b#As I lived the life of being the 'Sunrise Rose Princess' as they would've called me...$7#$b#I hated it... I was tired.. I was angry..$7#$b#I was not myself...$7"/emote farmer 40/pause 2000/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/message "Ysabelle is trying to wipe her tears off#But seems futile as more tears slowly replace the wiped ones."/speak Ysabelle "My goodness.. Here I am, crying out in front of a friend..$12#$b#I'm so sorry @... This might be a hassle for you to listen to..$7"/emote farmer 56/message "You wipe some of Ysabelle's tears off her cheeks#And you held her hand"/emote Ysabelle 60/speak Ysabelle "I have to admit..$12#$b#I do feel comfortable when you're around @...$12"/emote farmer 60/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/speak Ysabelle "And yeah.. well..$7#$b#One day.. I had enough.$7#$b#I was in a middle of this show performance for a group of important people... I don't even remember anymore..$7#$b#I just did what my parents wanted me to do..$7#$b#But at that day... at that certain performance..$7#$b#I cried in the middle of it.. Then I broke down in tears..$7#$b#And just.. well.. stopped dancing, and cried..$7#$b#Ofcourse, everyone was confused.. Especially my parents..$7#$b#I was then escorted backstage.. and as I waited for my parents to arrive..$7#$b#My mind was blank.. I didn't know what to feel..$7#$b#It's like I broke down... and I was just blank..$7#$b#A girl in a grand ballet dress, all glittered and dolled up, but with a blank emotion in the face amongst tears and sweat..$12#$b#Hehe.. I didn't even hear the scolding of my parents anymore as they arrived..$12"/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/speak Ysabelle "After that incident, I decided to run away..$7#$b#I just felt I had to.. And so I did..$7#$b#Rode some buses and eventually found my way here to the valley and stayed with my Grandpa.$7#$b#I have to tell you though, It was funny seeing his huge surprise when he saw me walk into the lobby of his hotel$12#$b#He contacted my parents afterwards and they made a deal..$7#$b#I was allowed to stay with him for the meantime as they try to clean up the mess I left back home..$7#$b#But that was a quite some time ago though.. I haven't really talked to them since, especially that I avoided their calls..$7#$b#Until earlier where I answered the call for I missed them... And hoping that they had changed..$7#$b#But no.. They still want me to perform for them...$7#$b#No way I'm going back..$7"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/speak Ysabelle "But hey, I'm not going back because of lots of reasons besides avoiding the fame and pressure.$12#$b#I actually like working in the hotel, even if it can be quite boring sometimes.$12#$b#And living here in the valley, and being with friends at last.$12#$b#I'm happy here..$12#$b#Especially having such friends like you @..$12#$b#Thank you, I'm truly grateful..$12"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 1/move Ysabelle 2 0 1/emote Ysabelle 60/pause 2000/speak Ysabelle "And uhm.. @..$12"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/speak Ysabelle "Thank you for listening to me..$12#$b#It really means a lot to me. I'm glad you're here.$12"/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 1 1/move farmer 1 0 1/emote Ysabelle 32/message "Ysabelle held your hands and gave you a smile.#She seems really glad she was able to open up to you."/pause 1000/end dialogue Ysabelle "Opening up my problems to you made me feel at ease @.$l#$b#Thank you.$h"
